Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: Publish stable fabric-client, fabric-ca-client npm modules from a release job. Dont publish from merge jobs.
Issue.description: Stable npm modules for fabric-client and fabric-ca-client are published to NPM after merge is successful in fabric-sdk-node and fabric-chaincode node. This change is to publish just the `snapshot` modules from merge jobs. The stable versions are published to NPM from fabric-chaincode-node-npm-release-x86_64 and fabric-sdk-node-npm-release-x86_64
